mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Schenck, Robert C.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Gov Peirpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] Wheeling Apl 20 1863. By Telegraph from Baltimore 20 1863. What field officers are in commission for the first 1st Va artillery & where are the Head Quarters of the regt are there any companies of it except co A eleventh 11th army corps & Co B at Winchester Robt C Schenck Maj Genl 36B 154pd
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Schenck, Robert C.
Baltimore, Maryland
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis H.
